channel.title: Need advice
channel.description:
I was wondering if you guy's could give me advise okay this was my old forums YES I KNOW it's unorganized and looks like shit for myBB www.diversityx.tk but this is my new and improved SMF forums not as good as my old forums but I have got a good start http://diversityx.tk/smfBoss/index.php my old smf forums was this for my older server http://www.landofelements.com/smf/index.php
Please tell me what you think of the new DiversityX forums

item.title: Need advice
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

dawsonsmokes:

Also Artic when your server gets 50+ online daily that was an average I have seen numbers over 80 on land of elements. When it reaches that come talk oh wait your under 8 members tops right now LOL

Mines hit over 600 daily, I’ll just take over. You cannot take constructive criticism, this isn’t anything special. You’re bragging about a private server, you should also know that just about everyone here thinks the themes on here are ugly, so why would it make a difference if you’re trying to get them to say that’s what they think? You need to take a long hard look in the mirror, this is also nice indirect advertising btw.

Read full topic

item.title: Need advice
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“dawsonsmokes, post:10, topic:525625”]the black and blue theme your talking about is on my land of elements old forums Also I am just asking vicky tries to bang on me every time I post its like she camps her post count so she gets well known as a bitch.[/quote]you’re the biggest fucking idiot in the world. this is like your second “let me post my forum link for ‘feedback’ but really its an advertisement to get my ‘site visitors’ counter to go up” post.

nobody gives a god damn about:
you
your server
your forums
your opinions
or anything you feel inclined to tell us about

ONTOPIC: your site is ugly as shit and you need to learn how to customize smf.

item.title: Need advice
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Not even trying to hide your shameless plug for your website? That’s sad. This should be locked, but even in all fairness it belongs in the General Server Discussion section.

Btw this is not the correct place to compare who’s server penis is bigger. If you’re asking for opinions and don’t get what you want from it, then shut up and take it like a man or remove your thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Need advice
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

What do you expect? A 5 star rating?

You banner does not match with the width of the forum, and there’s a random *. at the top. Your footer text is overlapping. You’re basically asking us for a review on certain themes. Not sure why a simple screenshot wasn’t taken either.

That blue/black theme is just extremely horrible.

Read full topic
